about_the_game:
Instead of Wukong, you’re the chosen one to start the journey to the west. But you’re not as omnipotent as Wukong, so the golden cudgel takes over… Control the golden cudgel to finish the journey !
There are also 81 (27 in each of the 3 chapters) difficulties (mark as skulls) on your journey, try to collect all of them!

Control

A and D control the rotation in the left and right directions.
The space controls the extension of the golden cudgel.
W controls the transmission to the landing point of the golden cudgel.

Last But Not Least,

Don’t get mad while playing. Practice more and you’ll get used to it.
Physics here is managed by the Chinese Immortals, instead of Newton.

Enjoy!
detailed_description:
Instead of Wukong, you’re the chosen one to start the journey to the west. But you’re not as omnipotent as Wukong, so the golden cudgel takes over… Control the golden cudgel to finish the journey !
There are also 81 (27 in each of the 3 chapters) difficulties (mark as skulls) on your journey, try to collect all of them!

Control

A and D control the rotation in the left and right directions.
The space controls the extension of the golden cudgel.
W controls the transmission to the landing point of the golden cudgel.

Last But Not Least,

Don’t get mad while playing. Practice more and you’ll get used to it.
Physics here is managed by the Chinese Immortals, instead of Newton.

Enjoy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: 神金棒棒PsychoCudgel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Umm… Just a 3D precision platformer game about Journey to The West. Might be a bit difficult.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
